name: Clone: Mrs Lord & Co - Custard Cream
description:
This is an attempt at a clone of one of my favourite ADV's.

I am making mine at 3mg with and "Max VG" (so about 85/15)
I think it needs a couple weeks to steep at least!
author: stark

reviews.text: Nice simple recipe that I keep going back too. I am going to try tweaking it to my liking. I really enjoy this recipe. I give it 5 stars for simplicity. It's a very rich, thick, buttery, vanilla custard.
